devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Manually add Roku devices by specifying a name and IP address.

autoDiscover.title: Auto Discover
autoDiscover.description: If true, the plugin will automatically discover Roku devices on the network.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
pollingInterval.description: How often to query the Roku TV for power state and active app.

excludedApps.title: Apps To Exclude
excludedApps.description: Enter the app's name that you want to hide.

excludedDevices.title: Excluded Devices
excludedDevices.description: Enter the IP address of Roku devices you want to exclude from auto-discovery.
